data.actual_result: The profile picture does not animate.
data.expected_result: Like the message action pop-up, the profile picture should animate.
data.short_description: When you long press on a person's username (who has an animated avatar) in the DM list, the profile picture does not animate.
data.steps_to_repro: - Start a DM with a person who has an animated avatar. - Open DM list. - Long press on their name. - Observe the pop-up.
